Request Press Copy

Description

Fauneroes is Tactical-RPG taking place in a fantasy forest world populated with cute animals. Explore the world with endless charming stories, recruit new allies, and overcome tactical challenges.

History

Features

  • Free Demo available.
  • Challenging tactical gameplay.
  • Charming cutscenes in every map.
  • Character progression and leveling.
  • Powerful combos and strategies for you to figure out, with near infinite combinations of units, species, skills and weapons.
  • Complete map editor and cutscene editor to create your own stories, or discover endless community made stories.
